## Matrix.forEach() method

Executes the `callback` function for each entry in the matrix.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
forEach(callback: (entry: S, rowIndex: number, columnIndex: number) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | <code>(entry: S, rowIndex: number, columnIndex: number) =&gt; void</code> | The function to execute for each entry |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
